timeline.bodyText: Super small thing but I'd recommend using title rather than name. I think title is very clearly from the title tag but name feels more ambiguous to me.
timeline.author: lognaturel

timeline.bodyText: This feels more like a spy to me since it's keeping extra state and verifying it rather than holding an expectation of what it's supposed to receive. Not that important but would be good to be somewhat aligned. I'm referring to https://martinfowler.com/articles/mocksArentStubs.html.
timeline.author: lognaturel
